title: See it all at once
text: ZenBook Pro Duo 15 OLED gives you a superbly immersive viewing experience, with a brilliant 4K OLED HDR NanoEdge display that delivers ultra-vivid colors and deep blacks.

title: Ultimate professional-grade colors
text: ASUS OLED laptops deliver exceptionally detailed and realistic visuals, with a cinema-grade 100% DCI-P3 color gamut. This means that the colors reproduced on the display are richer and more vivid

title: 70% blue-light reduction for eye care
text:
ASUS OLED laptops emit 70% less harmful blue light, which helps reduce visual discomfort
They’re also certified by TÜV Rheinland and SGS

title: Color-perfect at any brightness
text: ASUS OLED laptops can maintain good color reproduction at any brightness level, so you can adjust the screen's brightness to suit working environment, while still enjoying exceptionally vivid colors.

title: True black: See the unseen
text: ASUS OLED laptops reproduce blacks perfectly. This enables extremely crisp and clear images even in the darkest scenes.

title: Fastest response time for smooth actions
text: ASUS OLED displays have a 0.2 ms response time – 50x faster than the average laptop LCD display. This ensures smoother fast-paced action scenes, low-latency gameplay, and subtle details.
